text: José María Isaac Béjar (born 19 September 1985), commonly known as José Mari, is a Spanish footballer who plays as a left back. ==Football career== Born in Mérida, Badajoz, Extremadura, José Mari made his senior debuts with CD Alhaurino in the 2004–05 campaign, in Tercera División. On 21 August 2005 he moved to Málaga CF, being immediately loaned to UD Melilla in Segunda División B.El lateral izquierdo José Mari, un sub-23 perteneciente al Málaga y procedente del Alhaurino, nuevo jugador de la Unión Deportiva Melilla (Left back José Mari, an Málaga under-23 and from Alhaurino, new player of Unión Deportiva Melilla); Melilya, 22 August 2005 José Mari returned to the Andalusians in June 2006, and was assigned to the reserves also in the third level. He played his first match as a professional on 27 August, starting and being booked in a 1–0 away win against Hércules CF for the Segunda División championship.El Málaga arranca con buen pie gracias a Pablo Couñago (Málaga starts with good foot thanks to Pablo Couñago); Marca, 27 August 2006 José Mari scored his first professional goal on 9 December, netting the last of a 1–1 draw at UD Vecindario.Vecindario y Málaga firman tablas en un partido bronco (Vecindario and Málaga draw in a rough match); Marca, 9 December 2006 He appeared in eight matches during the season, as the Andalusians narrowly avoided another drop. On 20 July 2007 José Mari moved to Polideportivo Ejido, also in the second level.El Poli 'ata' al lateral del Málaga B José Mari y casi deja cerrada la zaga (Poli 'ties up' Málaga B's full back José Mari and almost closes the defense); Ideal, 20 July 2007 After appearing rarely, he was loaned to Valencia CF Mestalla on 15 January of the following year, until June.El Mestalla incorpora al lateral izquierdo Jose Mari, del Poli Ejido, en calidad de cedido (Mestalla signs left back Jose Mari, from Poli Ejido, on loan); CiberChe, 15 January 2008 José Mari continued to appear in the third and fourth divisions in the following campaigns, representing Mérida UD,Mérida: se incorpora José Mari (Mérida: José Mari signs); esFutbol, 1 September 2008 UD Logroñés,El lateral José Mari, primer fichaje de la Unión Deportiva Logroñés (Full back José Mari, first signing of Unión Deportiva Logroñés); El Correo, 9 July 2009 Marbella FC (two stints) and Unión Estepona CF. ==References== ==External links== * Marbella official profile * * * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:People from Mérida, Spain Category:Spanish footballers Category:Extremaduran footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Segunda División players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:Atlético Malagueño players Category:Málaga CF players Category:Polideportivo Ejido footballers Category:Valencia CF Mestalla footballers Category:UD Logroñés players
title: José María Isaac Béjar
